verbose_text: Consistent with this prediction, overexpression of MRP1 reduced the sensitivity of both H1299 and U-2 OS cells to the lethal effects of the MRP1 substrates vincristine and doxorubicin and increased sensitivity to the lethal effects of the system x c - inhibitor erastin2, the GPX4 inhibitors RSL3 and ML162, and the de novo GSH synthesis inhibitor buthionine sulfoximine (BSO), in some cases by> 100-fold (XREF_FIG; XREF_TABLE).
